about.title: About Us
about.description: Property Flow is our unique digital marketing offering created exclusively for property clients. We build sophisticated, award-winning solutions that encompass four quadrants: discover, design, build and grow.

blogs-.description:
Why Masterplans Matter

Interactive masterplans allow clients to see progress in real-time.

  • 3D modeling
  • GIS integration
This approach enhances transparency.

blogs-.title: Designing for Accessibility
blogs-.description: Accessibility in digital design ensures inclusive experiences for all users, including those with disabilities. Use semantic HTML, keyboard navigation, and ARIA attributes.

blogs-.title: Modern Backend with Go and PostgreSQL
blogs-.description: Building RESTful APIs in Go is clean, fast and scalable. Combine it with PostgreSQL for powerful data access and strong schema control.

blogs-.title: Deploying Nuxt on Vercel
blogs-.description: Vercel offers first-class support for Nuxt apps. Connect GitHub repo, set up build command and your app is live in minutes.

data.content: Digital discovery Site architecture (site map) Wireframes Website design - desktop and mobile Digital brand extension - formatting style sheet Website development and implementation CMS: Craf Third-party integrations - Salesforce CRM and Pardo Marketing assets: PDF generation, Email (transactional and campaign) templates etc. Major and minor website features e.g. interactive Masterplan, interactive Home Options Floorplan, etc Integration with REA and Domain
